items.sentence: After reading Tom\'s letter, Mary burst out crying.
Maybe Tom did the right thing for the wrong reason.
Maybe we should ask Tom if he wants this old piano.
Do you know what they call a French horn in French?
Do you want to come over and watch a movie with me?
Tom isn\'t really as rich as everyone thinks he is.
Tom knows he should do it, but he doesn\'t want to.
You should probably tell Tom you intend to do that.
Tom discovered that Mary had dated his best friend.
Tom says that he used to hang out with the Beatles.
